
Usage: paratest [switches]

--processes <number>     The number of phpunit processes to run. Defaults to 5.
--path <file|directory>  The path to a directory or file containing tests. Default to current working directory.
--phpunit <path>         The phpunit binary to execute. Defaults to just "phpunit".
--bootstrap <file>       A bootstrap file to be used by phpunit.
--functional             Run test methods in separate processes, rather than suites.
-h|--help                Print usage information.
